Files Headings

setData.js

 
var baseSetData = require('./baseSetData'),
    now = require('../date/now');

/** Used to detect when a function becomes hot. */
var HOT_COUNT = 150,
    HOT_SPAN = 16;

Sets metadata for func.

Note: If this function becomes hot, i.e. is invoked a lot in a short period of time, it will trip its breaker and transition to an identity function to avoid garbage collection pauses in V8. See V8 issue 2070 for more details.

Params
func Function The function to associate metadata with.
data The metadata. 
var setData = (function() {
  var count = 0,
      lastCalled = 0;

  return function(key, value) {
    var stamp = now(),
        remaining = HOT_SPAN - (stamp - lastCalled);

    lastCalled = stamp;
    if (remaining > 0) {
      if (++count >= HOT_COUNT) {
        return key;
      }
    } else {
      count = 0;
    }
    return baseSetData(key, value);
  };
}());

module.exports = setData;
